system.description:
You have reached greater heights of both covert skill and physical prowess, and you may have become a figure of fearful legend along the way. Or perhaps you are so quiet and so thorough that no one even knows to be afraid. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you use Long Step to Dash, you can use the Hide action at the end of your movement.
  • When you would gain a Skill Trick or Practiced Technique, you can choose freely from either list.
  • Half your adept levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of determining the damage of your Sneak Attack feature.
  • Half your rogue levels count as adept levels for the purpose of gaining the Extra Attack feature.
  • When you make a ranged attack with a Throwing Dagger, you can draw another Throwing Dagger as part of the attack, allowing you to throw multiple daggers on your turn if you have Extra Attack.
